Sentence: Agustin Beny is contacting me from South Australia.
I heard you were looking for an internship.
Where were you looking for an internship?
I was looking for an internship because I am paid.
The reason to avoid that is because we are doing live projects.
You used to work in a junior position with your seniors.
What you are providing is a training certificate.
I am not looking at training.
Can you tell me which position you were looking for?
